short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post and Search is a modern extension designed to bring modern architecture to your every day browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now your first browser page will no longer be a dull search bar but your new extension will bring you the joy of inspirational architecture. This browser extension was proudly designed by DECATON MEDIA LTD. All rights for technology design and content belong to DECATON MEDIA LTD.

Once installed you are able to customize the background by choosing your preferred image from one of the many options in our image library.

We hope you enjoy using Post and Search as much as we have.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Post and Search extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to Microsoft Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://sites.google.com/decatonmedia.com/post-and-search/terms-and-conditions and Privacy Policy at https://sites.google.com/decatonmedia.com/post-and-search/privacy-policy.
